arguments.name: message
arguments.description: Message that the bot should send.

arguments.name: delete the trigger
arguments.description: Would you like to delete your trigger message ? (true or false)

arguments.name: command or category
arguments.description: Command or category for which you want more information

settings.description: Allows you to modify the settings of the bots on this server
settings.name: Command Settings

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: The new value of the parameter

clear.description: Deletes messages in the living room.
clear.name: Command Clear

arguments.name: quantity
arguments.description: The number of messages you want to delete.

command.description: Enables or disables commands on the server.
command.name: Command Command

arguments.name: command
arguments.description: The command to be disabled or enabled.

info.description: Displays information about the server, a user, a show,...
info.name: Command Info

arguments.name: target
arguments.description: Corresponds to the item whose information you want to get.

language.name: Language
language.description: The language of the bot interface.

prefix.name: Prefix
prefix.description:
The prefix of the bot commands.
Shortcut: prefix [prefix].

error.invalidPermissions: You do not have sufficient permissions to run this command.
error.commandFailed: The command failed, please try again by changing the arguments.

help.title: User help for this bot
help.homeDescription: Welcome to the help menu of this bot, you can select a category with the drop down menu to see the different commands.

main.disabledCommand: The command is disabled on this server.

settings.title: Configuration interface of this bot
settings.description: Welcome to the help configuration menu of this bot. You can select a setting with the drop-down menu to see additional information.This message allows you to modify some settings with predefined choices through drop-down menus or buttons.
settings.commandPlaceholder: Choose a value for the parameter...
settings.invalidSetting: The requested setting does not exist.

clear.notAll: {{quantity}} messages have been deleted! A Discord limitation prevents deletion beyond 14 days.

command.title: Interface for managing bot commands on the server.
command.description: With this interface you can enable or disable commands on the server. To do this type the command `{{prefix}}command {your command}`.
